summary: Harper's a big-city PI, who travels to Louisiana to help an old girlfriend who's worried her husband will find out she's been cheating on him.
cast: Paul Newman|Joanne Woodward|Anthony Franciosa|Murray Hamilton|Gail Strickland|Melanie Griffith|Linda Haynes|Richard Jaeckel|Paul Koslo|Joe Canutt|Andrew Robinson|Coral Browne|Richard Derr|Helena Kallianiotes|Leigh French|Peter Dassinger|James Fontenot|Tommy McLain|Martin Ahrens|Philippe Blenet|Jerome Greene|Cecil Elliott
title: Con el agua al cuello
